Home.description: Book a ride to all your destinations in town and get a driver (Mamdoo) right where you are.

Home.why_choose_us_3_description: Tired of waiting ? Book a Mamdoo and ride away within minutes and all that at the best price in town.
Home.get_a_ride_in_minutes_description: In one click get everywhere you want. Really ? Yes Mamdoo is there to make your life easy
Home.advantage_2: Monitor all your previous rides! Stay in touch with your Mamdoo!
Home.our_technology_description: Our Mamdoo earn 3x more income than the regular drivers in 3x less time. And, we charge the lowest commission rates in the market.
Home.connected_clients_and_drivers: Millions of clients and driver connected through one network
Home.connected_clients_and_drivers_descriptio: We use the data in our warehouses to send drivers where the ridesâ€™ requests are at the highest. Thus satisfying both client and riders. Our drivers are trained to give the best service and make sure your ride is as comfortable as possible.
Home.other_services_description: Mamdoo will offer other services that will make your life easier and better.
Home.other_services_1_description: Send/receive packages in a few taps via our safe, no-contact delivery service.
Home.other_services_2_description: Order food and groceries and get them delivered right at your door.
Home.other_services_3_description: Pay all your bills in one click. And pay those of your loved ones as well
Home.any_question: Do you have any question ? Feel free to contact us
